unnormalised: Campus hiring initiatives at institutions like IIT Bombay are crucial for securing fresh talent. Dr. Sharma's panel observed a positive trend this year. Streamlining the process with online assessments reduced processing time. Placement offers averaged Rs. 8 Lakhs per annum. Companies are also eyeing Tier 2 colleges in places like Nagpur. Investing in future leaders requires dedicated resources and infrastructure like dedicated interview rooms of 200 sq ft.
normalised: Campus hiring initiatives at institutions like I I T Bombay are crucial for securing fresh talent. Doctor Sharma's panel observed a positive trend this year. Streamlining the process with online assessments reduced processing time. Placement offers averaged rupee eight lakh per annum. Companies are also eyeing Tier two colleges in places like Nagpur. Investing in future leaders requires dedicated resources and infrastructure like dedicated interview rooms of two hundred square feet.
